title: Regardless of its area, any Cluster Renewal Scheme (CRS) for which LOI has been issued under Regulation 33(9) of DCR 1991 prior to the date of coming into force of this Regulation can be allowed to be converted as per this Regulation at the request of the Promoter/Developer, with the prior approval of the State Govt
clause_text: Regardless of its area, any Cluster Renewal Scheme (CRS) for which LOI has been issued under Regulation 33(9) of DCR 1991 prior to the date of coming into force of this Regulation can be allowed to be converted as per this Regulation at the request of the Promoter/Developer, with the prior approval of the State Govt.
section: Relaxation in Building and other requirements:
